# ğŸ“š Course Overview

  • Instructor: Prof. Yoonsang Lee
  • Semester: 2025-1
  • Language: C++, OpenGL, GLSL (and more)
  • Topics include:
    • Affine Transformations
    • 2D/3D Projections
    • Rasterization Pipeline
    • Shading Models (Phong, Gouraud)
    • Texture Mapping
    • GPU Programming with GLSL
